mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM ess_department dept,ess_employee_dept dep WHERE dept.id = dep.dep_id AND dept.ept_id =#{id}
SELECT org_id FROM ess_enterprise WHERE id =#{id}
SELECT * FROM ess_enterprise WHERE admin_empid=#{id};

SELECT * FROM ess_enterprise
WHERE org_id=#{id};

SELECT * FROM ess_enterprise ent LEFT JOIN ess_department depart ON depart.ept_id = ent.id LEFT JOIN ess_employee_dept dept ON depart.id =dept.dep_id LEFT JOIN ess_employee emp ON emp.id = dept.emp_id WHERE emp.id =#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE vehicle SET mgrEnterpriseId = #{empId} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id,mgrEnterpriseId from vehicle where id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE driver SET mgrEnterpriseId = #{empId} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id,mgrEnterpriseId from driver where id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE driver SET mgrEnterpriseId = null WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT ent.id,org.id as orgid,ent.etpNm,org.orgNm from ess_enterprise ent LEFT JOIN ess_organization org ON ent.org_id=org.id WHERE org_id =#{orgId} and (ent.isDeleted is null or ent.isDeleted !=1) limit ${startRecord},${pageSize}
select count(1) from ess_enterprise ent LEFT JOIN ess_organization org ON ent.org_id=org.id WHERE org_id =#{orgId} and (ent.isDeleted is null or ent.isDeleted !=1)
SELECT DISTINCT ownerTransport FROM ess_enterprise
SELECT * FROM ess_enterprise WHERE admin_empid = #{id}
select id,etpNm from ess_enterprise where superEnt_id = #{id}
